title: Help
lines: Use Generate to create a video from audio files.
Generate & Upload posts the video directly to YouTube.
Batch Tools let you process multiple files at once.
Open Settings for more options and watch directory support.

main.title: Workflow Help
lines: Select audio then click Generate to create your video.

batch.title: Batch Help
lines: Batch Processor handles multiple files and Batch Upload posts them.

queue.title: Queue Help
lines: Process Queue runs all pending jobs.

settings_page.title: Settings Help
lines: Save default values for captions and watch directory.
